sentences.text: The thing that really eludes me is: why? Is there really so much money to be made? sentences.text: Could shooting be a gun-control tipping point? By CALVIN WOODWARD Associated Press WASHINGTON The question surfaces each time a mass murder unfolds: Will this one change the political calculus in Washington against tougher gun control? The answer, after the Virginia Tech killings, the attempted assassination of Gabby Giffords, the Colorado movie-theater attack, the Wisconsin Sikh temple shootings, and more: No.

sentences.text: Today?s sentencing sees 4 members of an organised crime gang behind bars for a substantial period of time.

sentences.ctext: Today?s sentencing sees 4 members of an organised crime gang behind bars for a substantial period of time.

sentences.text: "This was a lengthy and complex investigation into the criminal activities of a number of individuals who brought fear to the streets of Halton and Merseyside.
sentences.mtext: "="=``=0 This=this=DT=1 was=be=VBD=2 a=a=DT=3 lengthy=lengthy=JJ=4 and=and=CC=5 complex=complex=JJ=6 investigation=investigation=NN=7 into=into=IN=8 the=the=DT=9 criminal=criminal=JJ=10 activities=activity=NNS=11 of=of=IN=12 a=a=DT=13 number=number=NN=14 of=of=IN=15 individuals=individual=NNS=16 who=who=WP=17 brought=bring=VBD=18 fear=fear=NN=19 to=to=TO=20 the=the=DT=21 streets=street=NNS=22 of=of=IN=23 Halton=Halton=NP=24 and=and=CC=25 Merseyside=Merseyside=NN=26 .=.=SENT=27
sentences.ctext: "This was a lengthy and complex investigation into the criminal activities of a number of individuals who brought fear to the streets of Halton and Merseyside.

sentences.text: "A dedicated team of officers and staff both from Cheshire and Merseyside Police have spent hours securing evidence, searching for witnesses and painstakingly analysing exhibits to ensure that those responsible were brought to justice.

sentences.ctext: "A dedicated team of officers and staff both from Cheshire and Merseyside Police have spent hours securing evidence, searching for witnesses and painstakingly analysing exhibits to ensure that those responsible were brought to justice.

sentences.text: "The discovery of weapons of this kind on this scale within Cheshire is unheard of.

sentences.ctext: "The discovery of weapons of this kind on this scale within Cheshire is unheard of.

sentences.text: Never before have we seen firearms of this type - or ammunition of this quantity - on the streets of the county.

sentences.ctext: Never before have we seen firearms of this type - or ammunition of this quantity - on the streets of the county.

sentences.text: "We hope that the sentences handed down to the defendants will allow them time behind bars to reflect upon their actions - and the implications upon the local community in Halton.

sentences.ctext: "We hope that the sentences handed down to the defendants will allow them time behind bars to reflect upon their actions - and the implications upon the local community in Halton.

sentences.text: "It is clear that the 4 men believed they were above the law and now they are paying the ultimate price for their criminal activity.

sentences.ctext: "It is clear that the 4 men believed they were above the law and now they are paying the ultimate price for their criminal activity.

sentences.text: "Cheshire Police is committed to tackling organised crime within Halton - we will not tolerate those who choose to come into Cheshire believing it is an easy target - be warned as it is only a matter of time before we catch up with you.

sentences.ctext: "Cheshire Police is committed to tackling organised crime within Halton - we will not tolerate those who choose to come into Cheshire believing it is an easy target - be warned as it is only a matter of time before we catch up with you.

sentences.text: "Cross border crime is an issue for every force across the UK and we, like every other force, are committed to strengthening our borders and working with colleagues in neighbouring forces to successfully target organised and travelling criminals.

sentences.ctext: "Cross border crime is an issue for every force across the UK and we, like every other force, are committed to strengthening our borders and working with colleagues in neighbouring forces to successfully target organised and travelling criminals.

sentences.text: "In this case we worked closely alongside Merseyside Police as part of this investigation to build up a full picture of the criminal activities of this OCG and to ensure that this investigation was brought to a successful conclusion."

sentences.text: Detective Inspector Lee Schofield, from the specialist Merseyside Police Matrix Team, said: "The sentencing of these four men today sends out a strong message to those involved in drug and gun crime.

sentences.ctext: Detective Inspector Lee Schofield, from the specialist Merseyside Police Matrix Team, said: "The sentencing of these four men today sends out a strong message to those involved in drug and gun crime.

sentences.text: You cannot bring fear and misery to our streets and expect to get away with it.

sentences.ctext: You cannot bring fear and misery to our streets and expect to get away with it.

sentences.text: "These men probably thought that by committing crimes across force borders would help them to evade detection.
sentences.mtext: "="=``=0 These=these=DT=1 men=man=NNS=2 probably=probably=RB=3 thought=think=VBD=4 that=that=IN=5 by=by=IN=6 committing=commit=VBG=7 crimes=crime=NNS=8 across=across=IN=9 force=force=NN=10 borders=border=NNS=11 would=would=MD=12 help=help=VB=13 them=them=PP=14 to=to=TO=15 evade=evade=VB=16 detection=detection=NN=17 .=.=SENT=18
sentences.ctext: "These men probably thought that by committing crimes across force borders would help them to evade detection.

sentences.text: But we work very closely with our neighbouring forces and our joined up approach in relation to this investigation shows that no-one is untouchable.

sentences.ctext: But we work very closely with our neighbouring forces and our joined up approach in relation to this investigation shows that no-one is untouchable.

sentences.text: "This case highlights the dedication and commitment of the officers and support staff in Merseyside and Cheshire who worked together to take firearms and drugs out of the hands of these criminals to protect our local communities.

sentences.ctext: "This case highlights the dedication and commitment of the officers and support staff in Merseyside and Cheshire who worked together to take firearms and drugs out of the hands of these criminals to protect our local communities.

sentences.text: "Merseyside Police is committed to tackling gun and drug crime and we will act on all information reported to us through Crimestoppers.

sentences.ctext: "Merseyside Police is committed to tackling gun and drug crime and we will act on all information reported to us through Crimestoppers.

sentences.text: Anyone with information about those involved in gun and drug crime can contact the Matrix team on 0151 777 5687, or Crimestoppers on 0800 555 111."

sentences.text: Maria Corr, Senior Crown Prosecutor from the Crown Prosecution Service (CPS) Mersey Cheshire added: "These men were part of an organised crime gang involved in supplying heroin, cocaine and crack cocaine in Merseyside and Cheshire.
sentences.mtext: Maria=Maria=NP=0 Corr=Corr=NP=1 ,=,=,=2 Senior=Senior=NP=3 Crown=Crown=NP=4 Prosecutor=Prosecutor=NP=5 from=from=IN=6 the=the=DT=7 Crown=Crown=NP=8 Prosecution=Prosecution=NP=9 Service=Service=NP=10 (=(=(=11 CPS=CPS=NP=12 )=)=)=13 Mersey=Mersey=NP=14 Cheshire=Cheshire=NP=15 added=add=VBD=16 :=:=:=17 "="=``=18 These=these=DT=19 men=man=NNS=20 were=be=VBD=21 part=part=NN=22 of=of=IN=23 an=an=DT=24 organised=organise=VBN=25 crime=crime=NN=26 gang=gang=NN=27 involved=involve=VBN=28 in=in=IN=29 supplying=supply=VBG=30 heroin=heroin=NN=31 ,=,=,=32 cocaine=cocaine=NN=33 and=and=CC=34 crack=crack=NN=35 cocaine=cocaine=NN=36 in=in=IN=37 Merseyside=Merseyside=NN=38 and=and=CC=39 Cheshire=Cheshire=NP=40 .=.=SENT=41
sentences.ctext: Maria Corr, Senior Crown Prosecutor from the Crown Prosecution Service (CPS) Mersey Cheshire added: "These men were part of an organised crime gang involved in supplying heroin, cocaine and crack cocaine in Merseyside and Cheshire.

sentences.text: "They were prepared to use guns and violence to pursue their criminal trade and used those firearms as they expanded that trade into Cheshire.
sentences.mtext: "="=``=0 They=they=PP=1 were=be=VBD=2 prepared=prepare=VBN=3 to=to=TO=4 use=use=VB=5 guns=gun=NNS=6 and=and=CC=7 violence=violence=NN=8 to=to=TO=9 pursue=pursue=VB=10 their=their=PP$=11 criminal=criminal=JJ=12 trade=trade=NN=13 and=and=CC=14 used=use=VBD=15 those=those=DT=16 firearms=firearm=NNS=17 as=as=IN=18 they=they=PP=19 expanded=expand=VBD=20 that=that=DT=21 trade=trade=NN=22 into=into=IN=23 Cheshire=Cheshire=NP=24 .=.=SENT=25
sentences.ctext: "They were prepared to use guns and violence to pursue their criminal trade and used those firearms as they expanded that trade into Cheshire.

sentences.text: "This sentence brings to an end a complex investigation and successful prosecution by Merseyside and Cheshire Police and the Mersey Cheshire Complex Casework Unit of the CPS.
sentences.mtext: "="=``=0 This=this=DT=1 sentence=sentence=NN=2 brings=bring=VBZ=3 to=to=TO=4 an=an=DT=5 end=end=NN=6 a=a=DT=7 complex=complex=JJ=8 investigation=investigation=NN=9 and=and=CC=10 successful=successful=JJ=11 prosecution=prosecution=NN=12 by=by=IN=13 Merseyside=Merseyside=NN=14 and=and=CC=15 Cheshire=Cheshire=NP=16 Police=Police=NP=17 and=and=CC=18 the=the=DT=19 Mersey=Mersey=NP=20 Cheshire=Cheshire=NP=21 Complex=Complex=NP=22 Casework=Casework=NP=23 Unit=Unit=NP=24 of=of=IN=25 the=the=DT=26 CPS=CPS=NP=27 .=.=SENT=28
sentences.ctext: "This sentence brings to an end a complex investigation and successful prosecution by Merseyside and Cheshire Police and the Mersey Cheshire Complex Casework Unit of the CPS.

sentences.text: "Gangs, drugs and guns are a blight on our communities and we are committed to working closely with the police to bring these offenders to justice so that people can go about their business in safety.
sentences.mtext: "="=``=0 Gangs=gang=NNS=1 ,=,=,=2 drugs=drug=NNS=3 and=and=CC=4 guns=gun=NNS=5 are=be=VBP=6 a=a=DT=7 blight=blight=NN=8 on=on=IN=9 our=our=PP$=10 communities=community=NNS=11 and=and=CC=12 we=we=PP=13 are=be=VBP=14 committed=commit=VBN=15 to=to=TO=16 working=work=VBG=17 closely=closely=RB=18 with=with=IN=19 the=the=DT=20 police=police=NN=21 to=to=TO=22 bring=bring=VB=23 these=these=DT=24 offenders=offender=NNS=25 to=to=TO=26 justice=justice=NN=27 so=so=IN=28 that=that=WDT=29 people=people=NNS=30 can=can=MD=31 go=go=VB=32 about=about=IN=33 their=their=PP$=34 business=business=NN=35 in=in=IN=36 safety=safety=NN=37 .=.=SENT=38
sentences.ctext: "Gangs, drugs and guns are a blight on our communities and we are committed to working closely with the police to bring these offenders to justice so that people can go about their business in safety.

sentences.text: "These sentences mean that a group of violent and dangerous drug dealers are behind bars for some considerable time and that those firearms are no longer in circulation."
